ISSUE.TITLE: issue while upgrading from 0.84.14 to 0.91.10 - migration failed
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Please enter the following details** ``` NocoDB used as docker : true NocoDB version : **0.84.14** Database used in NC_DB URL : pg Project was created by clicking : New Project by connecting to external database Database on which spreadsheet is created : mysql OS on which NocoDB is running : Linux ``` **Steps To Reproduce** I have projects already running on 0.84.14, so upgrading the version to 0.90.0 provides with i was able to reproduce the issue locally as well. 1. Run command below: ``` docker run -d -p 8080:8080 \ -e NC_DB="mysql2://host.docker.internal:3306?u=root&p=password&d=d1" \ -e NC_AUTH_JWT_SECRET="569a1821-0a93-45e8-87ab-eb857f20a010" \ nocodb/nocodb:0.90.0 ``` 2. go to, localhost:8080 3. cant get /dashboard i have attached my ecs logs here as well. [log-events-viewer-result.csv](https://github.com/nocodb/nocodb/files/8956179/log-events-viewer-result.csv)
